alert.note: Alert for Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 7:24PM EDT until July 27 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Windham County in northern Connecticut... Southeastern Tolland County in northern Connecticut... Northeastern Washington County in Rhode Island... Northwestern Newport County in Rhode Island... Kent County in Rhode Island... Southern Providence County in Rhode Island... Northwestern Bristol County in Rhode Island... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 724 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sprague, or near Windham, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of SOUTHERN WINDHAM...SOUTHEASTERN TOLLAND...NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON...NORTHWESTERN NEWPORT...KENT...SOUTHERN PROVIDENCE AND NORTHWESTERN BRISTOL COUNTIES. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
